content.rendered: The following text is from Wikipedia.org and was used here for the sole purpose of this theme demo. The term “brutalism” was originally coined by the Swedish architect Hans Asplund to describe Villa Göth in Uppsala, designed in 1949 by his contemporaries Bengt Edman and Lennart Holm.
